content.name: lamp
content.label: Lamp
content.gloss: any device serving as a source of illumination

content.name: floor_lamp
content.label: Floor lamp
content.gloss: a lamp that stands on the floor

content.name: table_lamp
content.label: Table lamp
content.gloss: a lamp that stands on a table or other piece of furniture

content.name: ceiling_lamp
content.label: Ceiling lamp
content.gloss: A lamp that hangs from the ceiling

content.name: wall_lamp
content.label: Wall lamp
content.gloss: A lamp that attaches to the wall

content.name: landscape_lamp
content.label: Landscape lamp
content.gloss: A outside lamp, typically low to the ground, for illuminating the landscape and garden paths

content.name: street_lamp
content.label: Street lamp
content.gloss: A lamp supported on a post for illuminating a street

content.name: street_lamp_base
content.label: Street lamp base
content.gloss: Solid base for a street lamp (usually made of concrete)

content.name: lava_lamp
content.label: Lava lamp
content.gloss: A transparent electric lamp containing a viscous liquid in which a brightly colored waxy substance is suspended, rising and falling in irregular and constantly changing shapes.

content.name: lamp_unit
content.label: Lamp unit
content.gloss: Lamp head (with light bulb) and arm (no base)

content.name: lamp_head
content.label: Lamp head
content.gloss: Light source with cover

content.name: lamp_neck
content.label: Lamp neck
content.gloss: Piece that connects the lamp head with the lamp body

content.name: lamp_body
content.label: Lamp body
content.gloss: The main body of the lamp (connects the head and the base)

content.name: lamp_body_vertical_bar
content.label: Vertical Bar
content.gloss: Vertical Bar

content.name: lamp_body_horizontal_bar
content.label: Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: Horizontal Bar

content.name: lamp_body_slant_bar
content.label: Slant Bar
content.gloss: Slant Bar

content.name: lamp_body_horizontal_panel
content.label: Horizontal Panel
content.gloss: Horizontal Panel

content.name: lamp_body_vertical_panel
content.label: Vertical Panel
content.gloss: Vertical Panel

content.name: lamp_pole
content.label: Lamp pole
content.gloss: Lamp body formed from a long straight, thin tube

content.name: lamp_body_curved
content.label: Lamp body curved
content.gloss: Lamp body that is curved

content.name: lamp_body_jointed
content.label: Lamp body jointed
content.gloss: Lamp body with segments connected by one or more joints

content.name: lamp_body_solid
content.label: Lamp body solid
content.gloss: Lamp body with a solid shape

content.name: lamp_body_complex_decoration
content.label: Lamp body complex decoration
content.gloss: Lamp body with complex decoration that is difficult to decompose

content.name: lamp_cover
content.label: Lamp cover
content.gloss: a protective ornamental covering for a lamp, used to screen a light bulb from direct view

content.name: lamp_cover_holder
content.label: Lamp cover holder
content.gloss: Holder for a lamp cover

content.name: lantern_lamp_cover
content.label: Lantern lamp cover
content.gloss: Lamp cover similar to those used for lanterns

content.name: wireframe_lamp_cover
content.label: Wireframe lamp cover
content.gloss: Lamp cover that is just a wireframe

content.name: complex_decoration_lamp_cover
content.label: Complex decoration lamp cover
content.gloss: Lamp cover with complex decoration that is made from many pieces

content.name: lamp_harp
content.label: Lamp harp
content.gloss: A vertical metal frame shaped to bend around the bulb in a standing lamp and used to support a lamp shade

content.name: lamp_finial
content.label: Lamp finial
content.gloss: a small ornamental piece on the top of the lamp harp

content.name: lamp_wireframe_fitter
content.label: Lamp wireframe fitter
content.gloss: The metal structure that attaches the lamp cover to the lamp harp or light bulb.

content.name: pendant_lamp
content.label: Pendant lamp
content.gloss: Lamp that hangs via a chain from the ceiling

content.name: pendant_lamp_unit
content.label: Pendant lamp unit
content.gloss: Single pedant lamp head with chain

content.name: lamp_frame
content.label: Lamp frame
content.gloss: Frame for a set of lamp heads

content.name: chandelier
content.label: Chandelier
content.gloss: Branched lighting fixture, often ornate, that hangs from the ceiling

content.name: lamp_unit_group
content.label: Lamp unit group
content.gloss: Group of lamp units

content.name: circular_frame
content.label: Circular frame
content.gloss: Circular frame representing one layer of a lamp units for a chandelier

content.name: track_lighting
content.label: Track lighting
content.gloss: Lighting that is mounted on a track (typically on the ceiling)

content.name: recessed_lighting
content.label: Recessed lighting
content.gloss: Light fixture that is installed into a hollow opening in a ceiling

content.name: flush_mount_lighting
content.label: Flush mount lighting
content.gloss: Light fixture that is flush against the ceiling

content.name: outside_lamp_frame
content.label: Outside Lamp Frame
content.gloss: a frame part that is fixed on the ceiling, with a lamp body inside it

content.name: lamp_post
content.label: Lamp post
content.gloss: a metal post supporting an outdoor lamp (such as a streetlight)

content.name: lamp_joint
content.label: Lamp joint
content.gloss: Joint connecting two sections allowing for movement

content.name: lamp_arm
content.label: Lamp arm
content.gloss: support that connects the lamp head to the main lamp body

content.name: lamp_arm_straight_bar
content.label: Lamp arm straight bar
content.gloss: Main arm support as a straight bar (for connecting lamp head to lamp body)

content.name: lamp_arm_curved_bar
content.label: Lamp arm curved bar
content.gloss: Main arm support as a curved bar (for connecting lamp head to lamp body)

content.name: lamp_arm_decoration
content.label: Lamp arm decoration
content.gloss: Decorative part of lamp arm

content.name: lamp_arm_accordion
content.label: Lamp arm accordion
content.gloss: Expandable accordion arm

content.name: lamp_shade
content.label: Lamp shade
content.gloss: a protective ornamental covering for a lamp, used to prevent lamp from shining in all directions or lessen the brightness of the light bulb

content.name: lamp_base
content.label: Lamp base
content.gloss: a support or foundation for lamp

content.name: lamp_holistic_base
content.label: Lamp holistic base
content.gloss: Holistic lamp base that is composed mainly of one piece

content.name: lamp_leg_base
content.label: Lamp leg base
content.gloss: Lamp base with legs

content.name: bar_stretcher
content.label: Bar Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of bar/strip like shape

content.name: horizontal_panel
content.label: Horizontal panel
content.gloss: a horizontal panel

content.name: lamp_star_base
content.label: Lamp star base
content.gloss: Lamp base that includes a star-shaped leg structure.  Each leg of the star leg structure is near-horizontal to the ground plane.

content.name: star_leg_set
content.label: Star-shape Leg Set
content.gloss: a star shape structure that contains many legs and the correlated foots or casters

content.name: lamp_clamp_base
content.label: Lamp clamp base
content.gloss: Lamp base with clamp

content.name: lamp_base_part
content.label: Lamp base part
content.gloss: Part of a lamp base

content.name: light_unit
content.label: Light unit
content.gloss: Source of illumination (such as light bulb, or candle) with holder

content.name: light_bulb
content.label: Light bulb
content.gloss: a glass bulb that provides light by passing an electric current through a filament or a pocket of inert gas

content.name: light_socket
content.label: Light socket
content.gloss: a receptacle into which an light bulb can be inserted

content.name: clamp
content.label: Clamp
content.gloss: a device that that holds things firmly together

content.name: clamp_upper
content.label: Clamp upper
content.gloss: Upper part of a clamp

content.name: clamp_lower
content.label: Clamp lower
content.gloss: Lower part of a clamp

content.name: clamp_frame
content.label: Clamp frame
content.gloss: Clamp frame

content.name: clamp_screw
content.label: Clamp screw
content.gloss: Screw for fastening the clamp

content.name: clamp_handle
content.label: Clamp handle
content.gloss: Handle for adjusting the tightness of a clamp

content.name: leg
content.label: Leg
content.gloss: one of the supports for the lamp

content.name: telescoping_leg
content.label: Telescoping Leg
content.gloss: A leg that consisting of multiple pieces that can be expanded

content.name: upper_leg
content.label: Upper Leg
content.gloss: Upper part of a telescoping leg

content.name: lower_leg
content.label: Lower Leg
content.gloss: Lower part of a telescoping leg

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a support resembling a pedal extremity

content.name: switch
content.label: Switch
content.gloss: Control for turning the lamp on and off

content.name: button_switch
content.label: Button switch
content.gloss: Switch consisting of a button that is pressed on and off

content.name: knob_switch
content.label: Knob switch
content.gloss: Switch consisting of a knob that is toggled on and off

content.name: rotate_switch
content.label: Rotate switch
content.gloss: Switch consisting of a switch that is turned on and off

content.name: chain_switch
content.label: Chain switch
content.gloss: Switch consisting of a chain and controlled by pulling

content.name: movable_part
content.label: Movable Part
content.gloss: A part of switch that is movable

content.name: fixed_part
content.label: Fixed Part
content.gloss: A part of switch that is fixed

content.name: pull_chain
content.label: Pull chain
content.gloss: Chain that can be pulled

content.name: pull_chain_handle
content.label: Pull chain handle
content.gloss: Handle for pulling on the pull chain

content.name: connector
content.label: Connector
content.gloss: Connector for attaching parts of the lamp together

content.name: power_cord
content.label: Power cord
content.gloss: Power cord for hooking up the lamp to an electric source

content.name: cord
content.label: Cord
content.gloss: A light insulated conductor for household use

content.name: plug
content.label: Plug
content.gloss: An electrical device with two or three pins that is inserted in a socket to make an electrical connection

content.name: lamp_track
content.label: Lamp track
content.gloss: Ceiling track for mounting track lamps

content.name: lamp_cover_frame
content.label: Lamp cover frame
content.gloss: Frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_frame_top_finial
content.label: Lamp cover frame top finial
content.gloss: Decorative tip at the top part of the frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_frame_top
content.label: Lamp cover frame top
content.gloss: Top part of the frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_frame_bar
content.label: Lamp cover frame bar
content.gloss: Vertical bar of the frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_frame_bottom
content.label: Lamp cover frame bottom
content.gloss: Bottom part of the frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_frame_bottom_finial
content.label: Lamp cover frame bottom finial
content.gloss: Decorative tip at the bottom part of the frame of a lamp cover

content.name: lamp_cover_glass
content.label: Lamp cover glass
content.gloss: Clear lamp cover

content.name: glass_panel
content.label: Glass panel
content.gloss: clear, flat and rectangular sheet that forms component of something

content.name: crystal_chain
content.label: Crystal chain
content.gloss: Chain with crystal pieces (typically used in chandeliers)

content.name: pendant_crystal_chain
content.label: Pendant crystal chain
content.gloss: Chain with crystal pieces (typically used in chandeliers) that hangs down

content.name: candle
content.label: Candle
content.gloss: stick of wax with a wick in the middle

content.name: electric_light
content.label: Electric light
content.gloss: Electric light

content.name: electric_candle
content.label: Electric candle
content.gloss: Electric lamp that looks like a candle

content.name: chain
content.label: Chain
content.gloss: a series of (usually metal) rings or links fitted into one another to make a flexible ligament

content.name: candle_holder
content.label: Candle holder
content.gloss: Holder for the candle

content.name: candle_tube
content.label: Candle tube
content.gloss: Tubular part of the candle

content.name: candle_flame
content.label: Candle flame
content.gloss: Flame of the candle

content.name: wick
content.label: Wick
content.gloss: a loosely woven cord (in a candle or oil lamp) that draws fuel by capillary action up into the flame

content.name: hook
content.label: Hook
content.gloss: A piece of metal or other material, curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on

content.name: plant_pot
content.label: Plant pot
content.gloss: Pot for plant or flowers (sometimes attached to streetlights)

content.name: banner
content.label: Banner
content.gloss: A long strip of cloth bearing a slogan or design (sometimes attached to streetlights)

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: The part by which the lamp or lamp head is held, carried, or controlled.

content.name: lava_lamp_top
content.label: Lava lamp top
content.gloss: Top part of a lava lamp

content.name: lava_lamp_bottom
content.label: Lava lamp bottom
content.gloss: Bottom part of a lava lamp

content.name: lava_lamp_glass
content.label: Lava lamp glass
content.gloss: Glass vessel forming the body of a lava lamp

content.name: liquid
content.label: Liquid
content.gloss: Liquid in which lava lamp wax bubbles float

content.name: wax_bubble
content.label: Wax bubble
content.gloss: Floating bubbles found in a lava lamp
